title: Discovering Caral, The Oldest Civilization In America
description: Discover the cradle of civilization on an exciting full-day tour to Caral from Lima. Explore the majesty of the oldest city in America with its monumental architecture and ancient pyramids. Immerse yourself in pre-Inca history as you explore this UNESCO World Heritage archaeological site. Embark on a fascinating journey from the modernity of Lima to the ancient mysteries of Caral in a single day!
all_descriptions: Discover the cradle of civilization on an exciting full-day tour to Caral from Lima. Explore the majesty of the oldest city in America with its monumental architecture and ancient pyramids. Immerse yourself in pre-Inca history as you explore this UNESCO World Heritage archaeological site. Embark on a fascinating journey from the modernity of Lima to the ancient mysteries of Caral in a single day!

ItineraryThis is a typical itinerary for this productStop At:Miraflores District, Lima PeruSan Isidro ‚Äì Miraflores ‚Äì Downtown Lima ‚Äì Barranco:
We begin our adventure by picking up each traveler from their Hotel or Airbnb at 6:00 am in the morning according to our included pick-up points (1 day before we will confirm the pick-up time according to the location of their Hotels) .Duration: 10 minutesStop At:Caral, Caral, Lima Region06:30 AM ‚Äì 09:00 AM: Road Trip to Caral
Enjoy a comfortable trip as you travel from Lima to the archaeological complex of Caral. Along the way, you'll be able to appreciate the changing landscape and learn about the history of the region.Duration: 4 hoursStop At:Zona Arqueologica caral, carretera panamericana norte Km 184, Caral Peru09:00 AM ‚Äì 09:30 AM: Welcome and Orientation in Caral
Upon arrival in Caral, you will be welcomed by our specialized guide. You will receive a detailed introduction to the history and archaeological significance of Caral before beginning your exploration.

09:30 AM ‚Äì 12:30 PM: Tour of the Caral Archaeological Complex
Explore ancient pyramids, plazas and archaeological structures dating from approximately 3000 BC to 1800 BC Discover the rich culture and architecture of this pre-Inca civilization.Duration: 4 hoursStop At:Huacho, Huacho, Lima Region12:30 PM ‚Äì 02:00 PM: Lunch at a Local Restaurant
Enjoy a delicious lunch at a local restaurant, where you can taste Peruvian cuisine and rest before continuing your day (Lunch not included).Duration: 1 hourStop At:Lima, Lima, Lima Region03:30 PM ‚Äì 07:00 PM: Return to Lima
Begin the journey back to Lima, reflecting on the richness of history and culture you have experienced in Caral.

07:00 PM: Arrival at your Hotel in Lima
Conclude your day with arrival at your hotel in Lima, with your mind full of knowledge about the amazing civilization of Caral.

This itinerary provides a complete experience, allowing you to explore the archaeological treasures of Caral in a single day from Lima.Duration: 4 hours

reviews.text: Possibly the most important archaeological site DE America. Rewrite history regarding its population. Excellent attention DE Jos√© and Benja. For me a site DE greater historical value than the Urubamba Valley.

reviews.title: Amazing.
reviews.text: Excellent excursion. It is really shocking to see the remains of civilizations from 5000 years ago and the degree of knowledge they had and respect for the environment. Our guides (Noem√≠ and Bryan) and our driver (Benji) with their information, their kindness and good disposition made the experience unforgettable. Thank you so much!

reviews.title: Beautiful excursion to Caral and Bandurria
reviews.text: A great tour that allowed us to learn about the earliest known civilization in the Americas. Ricardo provided an excellent, professional, and attentive guide, with great assistance from Benami as our tour driver.

reviews.title: Avoid booking this tour from Lima when the Rio near Caral is flooding
reviews.text: The site should not be visited from Lima when the Rio near Caral is flooding. Our car trip from Lima, in a small vehicle with ordinary suspension, took 14 hours. Of these 14 hours, about 10 were spent on the road, and of these 10 hours 3 were spent on a tedious and unkempt dirt road that now serves chicken farms. We were the only tourist party on the road. These three hours were not only tedious but they were excruciating because my wife suffers from severe back pain and the bumpy drive triggered an inflammatory crisis. She will have to spend time in bed to recover. The company, Inca Trilogy Tour, told us that the new road currently used to access Caral could not be taken because of the Rio's flooding. We would have liked to have been told of the fact when we booked the tour. POTENTIAL CUSTOMERS, BE SURE TO CHECK THE ITINERARY OF THIS TOUR BEFORE BOOKING a Caral tour with it. We suggest that the tour not be offered when the Rio is flooding.

reviews.title: Fantastic day to Caral!
reviews.text: Fantastic day to Caral, tour guide was very friendly and knowledgeable. It was an enjoyable day, if you are wanting to see Caral you should only go with this tour operator!!

reviews.title: Must see if you have the time
reviews.text: Great tour,very informative and fun. Ricardo and Diego were very helpful and accommodating. We learned a lot about the local culture and history. Tour is well organized with food stops. We were lucky to be able to see this unique site. The tour was recommended by our guide at MALI museum.

reviews.title: The oldest cradle of humanity in two Americas
reviews.text: The amazing archaeological site! Little known, should be more. The oldest cradle of humanity in two Americas! Very well prepared for history lovers.

reviews.title: Fantastic tour to Carsal
reviews.text: One of the best tours I have taken, totally recommended, lucky to be able to get to know the cultures of Peru... I will definitely return and take the same tour, the guide was excellent, very professional and very knowledgeable about the local culture.

reviews.title: Caral Ruins
reviews.text: Very interesting excursion. Thank the guide River, the guide Diana and the driver Diego for their closeness, and especially for adapting to our circumstances and picking us up at home. Everything is very good and the craftsmanship at a good price and quality.

reviews.title: It was an incredible visit!
reviews.text: The visit was great, the driver was very cautious and the guide was phenomenal, Caral was an incredible civilization that created many technologies that were later used by other pre-Inca cultures.
